nodes.name: Magically Thievish Thieves Guild
nodes.summary: Adds Open scrolls for sale by the Thieves Guild. Also changes the faction favoured skills to reflect more varieties of theft, particularly to allow mages skilled in Illusion and

nodes.name: Suran - Oran Manor Gardens
nodes.summary: Gives Oran Manor a garden to be proud of. Also adds a new NPC and a new guar called Chonky. Optional TR-based version with a quest to add more plants to the garden.

nodes.name: Retirement Homes
nodes.summary: Ever thought about what happens to your character when your playthrough ends? Mine are here.

nodes.name: Store Entrance Chimes for Cyrodiil and TR Mainland
nodes.summary: Bring's R0's Store Entrance Chimes to Cyrodiil and the Imperial towns in mainland Morrowind.

nodes.name: Raven Rock Enhanced
nodes.summary: Makes Raven Rock more dynamic. Have you ever wondered why Falco doesn't build himself a house? Where he and the miners sleep while they're waiting for construction to complete?

nodes.name: OLOB Odai Lifeblood of Balmora Patch Project
nodes.summary: A collection of patches and personal edits to the excellent Odai - Lifeblood of Balmora.

nodes.name: Caldera Legion Barracks
nodes.summary: Where do all the guards in Caldera sleep when they have no beds? Well, now they have a nice comfy barracks.

nodes.name: Transport to Uncle Sweetshare's Advent Calendar
nodes.summary: Adds a sleigh-riding Nord in Seyda Neen ready to take you to collect your advent calendar gifts

nodes.name: Balmora Temple Redone Reintegrated
nodes.summary: Markond's Balmora Temple Redone, but easier to navigate and with the vanilla Temple cell re-integrated. Also adds a short new quest and a little dialogue.

nodes.name: Tel Branora - Trerayna's Camp
nodes.summary: Trerayna Dalen and her followers have been stuck standing outside Tel Branora for more than 20 years. It's time they finally had a proper camp.

nodes.name: Character Goals
nodes.summary: Set a goal for your character! See it on your character sheet, generate a random goal, write a custom goal yourself. Requires MWSE.

nodes.name: Provincial Bath Shoppe - Of Perfumes and Parvenues
nodes.summary: Korana's Provincial Bath Shoppe, now with a questline suitable for low level characters and overhauled interior using OAAB/TD assets. Also adds new perfumes and other toiletry

nodes.name: Bounty Posters modders resource
nodes.summary: Some bounty posters for various outlaws in vanilla + popular mods. Also some PSDs to make your own.

nodes.name: Shader Hotkeys
nodes.summary: MWSE/MGE XE. Adds hotkeys to toggle specific shaders on and off from in-game.

nodes.name: Even More Illuminated Order Improved Fixes
nodes.summary: Dialogue fixes, Demnevanni manor updates, Rocky West Gash and Stoneflower Trading Post compatibility

nodes.name: Cuirass Equity
nodes.summary: Makes the Imperial Chain, Imperial Steel and Netch Leather armours always use the male version, instead of substituting a completely different-looking female version.

nodes.name: Elven Nations Seek Forever The Seyda Neen
nodes.summary: Based on concept art and MK comments. Adds a bard to the Elven Nations Cornerclub in Vivec's Hlaalu Canton. She sings the ballad Seek Forever the Seyda Neen by DimNussens, based on

nodes.name: Join the Dissident Priests
nodes.summary: Now you can join the Dissident Priests, at the appropriate point in the main quest. 8 new quests.

nodes.name: Luxury Camping Addon for Ashfall
nodes.summary: Adds some new bedrolls, straw beds, and tents for you to craft via Ashfall. Meshes by the amazing DimNussens.

nodes.name: Songbird - Choose Your Music
nodes.summary: Allows you to choose what song to play, compile a list of favourites, and view the currently playing song (name + file path), all from a handy in-game menu. MWSE Lua.

nodes.name: Ahnassi Shares a Song
nodes.summary: Once Ahnassi considers you a friend, you can ask her to "share a song" from DimNussen's Baandari Dreams album. Standalone.

nodes.name: Snug Suran - OAAB Oran Manor Upgrade
nodes.summary: Improves Oran Manor so it looks more like somewhere a noble might live. Comes with vanilla or white Suran versions.

nodes.name: OAAB Seyda Neen - Damp Little Squat
nodes.summary: OAAB overhaul of Seyda Neen, with unique building meshes, overhauled interiors, a coast guard station, two new taverns, unique dialogue, and more!

nodes.name: OAAB Better Caldera Interiors
nodes.summary: Improves most interiors in Caldera in a lore-friendly way using OAAB/TD assets.

nodes.name: Docks of Suran OAAB-ified
nodes.summary: Patches Vallylilly's Docks of Suran to use OAAB assets and makes minor tweaks for better compatibility with Ashfall. Requires original mod.

nodes.name: OAAB Ebonheart Six Fishes Improved
nodes.summary: Overhauls the Six Fishes tavern in Ebonheart to be more memorable and lively. 2 new quests. The top floor is now an officers lounge, and a bottom floor with a kitchen and rental

nodes.name: OAAB Livelier Lucky Lockup
nodes.summary: Overhauls the Lucky Lockup Tavern in Balmora - subtle atmospheric improvements on the original floor, with a new basement with a kitchen and places for all the NPCs to sleep.

nodes.name: Shabby Balmora Labor Town
nodes.summary: Replaces the meshes of several buildings in Balmora's Labor Town slum with cracked, run-down versions. Optionally adds broken cobblestones that haven't been repaired properly.

nodes.name: OAAB Pelagiad Interior Overhaul
nodes.summary: Overhauls the interiors of Pelagiad using assets from OAAB data and TD.

nodes.name: Shabby Gnaar Mok
nodes.summary: Visual overhaul of the Hlaalu building in Gnaar Mok to look more run-down and shabby. Compatible with texture replacers and most Gnaar Mok mods including BCOM. Meshes are available

nodes.name: Shabby Seyda Neen
nodes.summary: Replaces the buildings in Seyda Neen with shabby, run-down versions made by DimNussens that match the swampy environment. Uses whichever texture replacer you're using.

nodes.name: Penguin Island
nodes.summary: Life feeling overwhelming? Ever wanted to get away from it all and just hang out on a peaceful, cosy island in the Sea of Ghosts with some feathered friends? Yeah, me too.

nodes.name: NOD - NPC Outfit Diversity
nodes.summary: Overhauls the appearance of more than 850 NPCs, using assets created by the Morrowind community. Aims to add more colour and flair while respecting the lore. Works with both MWSE

nodes.name: Leap of Faith
nodes.summary: A new merchant has come to Gnisis, selling potions of jump to would-be fast travelers. A pilgrim has gone missing. Are these two things as unrelated as they might seem? A small

nodes.name: OAAB Huleen's Hut Overhaul
nodes.summary: OAAB overhaul of Huleen's Hut, now with 100% more destroyed crates. If Listien survives he will now tidy up after the quest, and he will have some extra dialogue.

nodes.name: OAAB Brother Junipers Twin Lamps
nodes.summary: Update of Brother Juniper's classic quest mod. Join the Twin Lamps and fight against slavery through ~20 new quests. Now with overhauled locations, bug fixes, and extra dialogue

nodes.name: Useful Maps and Guides
nodes.summary: Makes the "Guide to..." scrolls more useful by scripting them to reveal the cities on your world map.

nodes.name: LDM - Racist Service Refusal
nodes.summary: Camonna Tong NPCs will now refuse to provide services to Argonians and Khajiit unless at a very high disposition.

nodes.name: More Exclusive Factions
nodes.summary: Some factions will now refuse you membership if you have already joined other factions that they disapprove of. Others will make you jump through some extra hoops if you're a

nodes.name: Even Seedier Eight Plates
nodes.summary: VIsual overhaul of the Eight Plates tavern in Balmora, combined with an expansion of the NPC and dialogue overhaul from Von Djangos' The Seedy Plates

nodes.name: LDM - Ashlanders
nodes.summary: Adds Ashlander-specific dialogue for several topics where it was missing, preventing Ashlanders from switching randomly between Ashlander and non-Ashlander style speech.

nodes.name: The Merchants of Sadrith Mora
nodes.summary: A small expansion for Sadrith Mora focusing on adding new merchants that provide services the town lacked, such as a bookseller. Includes a small player house and one new quest, as

nodes.name: LDM - Context Matters
nodes.summary: Edits, re-filters, or adds on to vanilla dialogue to add more situational nuance - tavern owners will no longer talk about themselves in third person, Ashlanders will no longer

nodes.name: Brother Juniper's Ashlander Traders - Remastered
nodes.summary: Brother Juniper's excellent Ashlander Traders mod, edited for compatibility and extra dialogue. Adds Ashlander Traders who will sometimes appear in Balmora, Ald-ruhn, or Suran.

nodes.name: Naked and Alone
nodes.summary: Calling on the gods to save you from your own mistakes should be a last resort. Intervention now drops your stuff at the cast point, requiring you to either cut your losses or

nodes.name: Valley of the Wind Atmospheric Enhancements
nodes.summary: According to Ashlander dialogue, the Valley of the Wind is rarely travelled because the spirits there are restless. This mod adds haunting sound effects and removes fences from the

nodes.name: LDM - Vampire Talk
nodes.summary: Adds and fixes vampire-related dialogue.

nodes.name: LDM - Abolitionists
nodes.summary: Refilters and adds on to vanilla dialogue about abolitionists, so that plantation and mine owners who make their money off slavery don't give the same line as other Hlaalu, who are

nodes.name: LDM - Balmora Rumour Fix
nodes.summary: Adds an option to refuse Larrius Varro's Bloodbath quest, and edits the filtering on vanilla Balmora rumours so that they don't get overwritten by the Varro rumours. 16+ rumours

nodes.name: Luce's Misc Mods and Patches
nodes.summary: Assorted mods I think people might be interested in, which are too small to justify having their own page.

nodes.name: Balmora Guilds Expanded
nodes.summary: Expands and redecorates the interiors of the Balmora mages and fighters guild (as well as minor changes to the Temple). Also adds new quests, NPCs, and dialogue. Now with OAAB.

nodes.name: Balmora Slum House
nodes.summary: Yet another Balmora house mod, this time cramped, cozy, and Container!ised.

nodes.name: Sadrith Mora Backstreet Pod
nodes.summary: Adds a buyable housepod in Sadrith Mora, for aspiring Telvanni mages or people who just really like mushrooms.

nodes.name: Caldera Mages Guild Expanded
nodes.summary: Lore-friendly and balanced expansion of the Caldera Mages Guild, with some quests and new NPCs.

nodes.name: Clear Your Name
nodes.summary: In vanilla Morrowind, you have two options for clearing a bounty: turning yourself in to the guards or joining the Thieves Guild and paying them to make the problem go away. This

nodes.name: Thirsk Expanded for Solstheim TOTSP
nodes.summary: Compatibility patch (replacement ESP) for Princess Stomper's Thirsk Expanded and Wollibeebee's Solstheim overhaul, Solstheim: Tomb of the Snow Prince.

nodes.name: OAAB Balmora Redecorated
nodes.summary: Lore-friendly, atmospheric enhancements to many Balmora interiors, to reflect the personality and social status of their owners, make them feel lived in and in some cases, to give
